Welcome to the group Ben =) Its a mix and match group. Some are researchers, some are ghosthunters, some just are here out of curiousity or to investigate the things going on around them. 

  We look forward to your input. 
   
  Ya know I think I still have some of your evp's you guys recorded for the Ashleys investigation ages ago. I should run them thru my p1 filter to see if we missed out on anything. LOL
   
  I did that to some of my early recordings and was surprised at the results.
   
  Misty
benjamin tait <paulbearer666200@...> wrote:
          I am so glad that Misty sent me this link. Anywho...My name is Ben and 
I am the founder of The Melbourne Paranormal Foundation. Me and my 
group are based here in Melbourne ,FL and I have known Misty for over 2 
years now. I personally have been interested in the paranormal ever 
sence my 1st experence with it when I was 10 years old or so. I hope to 
meet some of y'all soon and I hope that we ALL can openly share our 
experences.
